default.comment: Color of primary interactive color e.g. buttons

hover.comment: Color of primary interactive color on hover  e.g. buttons

active.comment: Color of primary interactive color on active  e.g. buttons

default.comment: Color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

hover.comment: Color of secondary interactive color e.g. secondary buttons

active.comment: Color of secondary interactive color  e.g. secondary button

default.comment: Color of interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons

hover.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons.

active.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons.

disabled-button.comment: Disabled state for buttons. Opacity at 50%.

disabled-toggle.comment: Disabled state for toggles. Opacity at 25%.

disabled-text-input.comment: Disabled state for text inputs. Opacity at 10%.

selected.comment: Background color for selected state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

selected-hover.comment: Background color for hover state of on selected UI Elements

hover.comment: Background color for hover state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

focus-on-dark.comment: Outline color for focus state on dark backgrounds

on-dark.comment: Text color on top of interactive color on a dark background

on-disabled.comment: Text color on top of disabled state color

on-hover.comment: Text color on top of hover state of UI Elements

on-selected.comment: Text color on top of selected state of UI Elements

on-selected-hover.comment: Text color on top of hover and selected state of UI Elements
